text: Gambusia is a genus of fish in the family Poeciliidae (order Cyprinodontiformes). They are often called topminnows, or simply gambusias; they are also known as mosquitofish which refers to two species, Gambusia affinis and Gambusia holbrooki. == Extinct species == The Amistad gambusia (Gambusia amistadensis) is the only extinct species. Category:Cyprinodontiformes
title: Gambusia
